belongs_to_collection.name: The Adventures of Mary-Kate & Ashley Collection

original_title: The Adventures of Mary-Kate & Ashley: The Case of the Hotel Who-Done-It
overview: There's trouble in paradise! Join the twin detectives, Mary-Kate & Ashley Olsen ("Full House"), and their sidekick dog, Clue, as they check in for excitement at the Hilton Hawaiian Village Hotel.
title: The Adventures of Mary-Kate & Ashley: The Case of the Hotel Who-Done-It
